attr.pathogenesis: enlargement of the stomach associated with rotation on the mesenteric axis
attr.complications: gastric distension, volvulus, obstruction of blood flow

reference: Merck Veterinary Manual. Gastric Dilation and Volvulus in Small Animals - https://www.merckvetmanual.com/digestive-system/diseases-of-the-stomach-and-intestines-in-small-animals/gastric-dilation-and-volvulus-in-small-animals
